item.title: US-30 East approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-72. Turn left for ID-72; continue straight for access to I-84.

item.title: US-30 East approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-72. Turn left for ID-72; continue straight for access to I-84.

item.title: ID-52 East at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 east at ID-72 junction. Turn left to continue on ID-52 east to Emmett. Turn right for ID-72 west to New Plymouth. Sand Hollow Road (old US-30) continues south.

item.title: End ID-72 West at US-30
item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30 in Payette County. Use US-30 west for I-84.

item.title: End ID-72 West at US-30
item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30. Turn right for US-30 west to New Plymouth and Emmett. Turn left for US-30 east to I-84.

item.title: End ID-72 Approaching US-30
item.description: End ID-72 approaching US-30 in Payette County.

item.title: ID-72 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-72 west. Distance to US-30.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 West at ID-72 west in Payette County. Turn right to continue west on ID-52. Continue straight for ID-72 west.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west at ID-72 west to New Plymouth. Use ID-52 west for Payette. Turn left for Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: ID-52 West Approaching ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west approaching ID-72 west in Payette County.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-72
item.description: US-30 west at ID-72 east to Emmett. Continue west on US-30 for New Plymouth.

item.title: US-30 West At ID-72
item.description: US-30 west approaching ID-72 in Payette County.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 west approaching ID-72 in Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west to Payette at ID-72 to New Plymouth, and Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west at ID-72 west in Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72 - To I-84
item.description: To I-84 at ID-52/ID-72 junction. For I-84 east, follow ID-72 to New Plymouth. For I-84 west, follow Sand Hollow Road to Caldwell.

item.title: Jct. ID-72 on ID-52 west
item.description: Junction ID-72 on ID-52 west in Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 East at ID-72
item.description: ID-72 Junction to New Plymouth on ID-52 East
